summary: Ever wonder what a bear addicted to moon sugar would look like? Well a group of bears that are addicted to it think it is skooma. One in particular made its way to Whiterun in The Bannered Mare and is wishing for assistance in retrieving his 'skooma'.
descriptionHtml:
Ever wonder what a bear addicted to moon sugar would look like? Well a group of bears that are addicted to it think it is skooma. One in particular made its way to Whiterun in The Bannered Mare and is wishing for assistance in retrieving his 'skooma'.

This mod introduces the 'skooma' bear as a creature into the Skyrim universe. Also, a special one named Sniffs is your companion. This companion uses a custom system outside of the vanilla system, derived from the vanilla marriage mechanics. In other words, you can send him to one of your houses, to follow you, to go back to The Bannered Mare, or to stay put, without sacrificing your other favorite companion. Enjoy

What is added:
-Added 'Skooma' Bear
-Sniffs is a 'Skooma' Bear that can be a companion (fully voice acted)
-Companion quest to unlock Sniffs (non-killable companion)
-Companion system to go to purchased vanilla house/wait/follow/go back to The Bannered Mare
-Allows for other companions in use

Known Quirks:
-Must turn in quest outside of the dungeon.
-IF Dialogue does not work intially, save your game, load that save game, and try again. 1.7 patch broke custom dialogue.

Additional Credits:
- CaptSpiffy - Beta Tester
- Debo - Voice Acting
- FreeFrag Network (www.freefrag.com) Collaboration

Revision changes:
v1.5:
-Added missing SEQ file for proper quest/dialogue actions.
-Added missing script files.
-Fixed any issues from 1.4.
v1.4:
-Fixed follower logic not working for all users.
v1.3:
-Increased follower distance to reduce bumping/pushing of player. Will still do so if too far away.
v1.2:
-Added missing voice file
v1.1:
-Removed the beta test spell which breaks all the things.

There is another version uploaded in which Sniffs can die. Not originally intended to allow, but requested and not much rework required so here we are. Enjoy!

Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
author: Arron Dominion
